attributes.title: 2020 Renault Sandero 900T Expression

attributes.description:
Toyota’s famed Fortuner is a firm favourite amongst South African families who need a spacious seven seater SUV, that’s also willing to go on adventures off the beaten track. The Fortuner remains the best selling SUV on the South African market due to Toyota's undeniable reliability and dependability. This particular Fortuner has been well looked after, and mileage kept to minimum, together with a full service history at Toyota only.

Don't Miss Out, Call Us Today, or Leave Your Details and We Will Call You.

Finance Can Be Arranged, Nationwide Delivery, Trade-ins Welcome.

Price Excludes Documentation and Registration Costs E&OE

As one of the many Motus Select Pre-owned dealerships, we pride ourselves in excellent service and offer vehicles that can be trusted and enjoyed. Customer satisfaction is our main priority! 

MOTUS: Live. Love. Drive…

64072700

attributes.description: Come in today and test drive this car, IT IS FOR YOU! Don’t delay we will evaluate your existing vehicle for FREE. We will not short-change you. Visit our website to see our full range of stock. A 1% of the value of the vehicle non-refundable deposit, secures the vehicle for two days. If that deposit lapses, You would be required to put another non-refundable deposit to secure it further. Please be aware of scams with fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos. DO NOT pay any deposits unless you deal and pay deposits directly into Primo Executive Cars bank account!

attributes.description:
Moon Light Blue Metallic with two tone Dark Grey and Black leather seats, Full service history with spare keys and last service done less than 1500 km ago, Active xenon headlights with washers and LED daytime driving lights, Front and rear fog lights, 21 Inch 911 Carrera sport style mag wheels, Factory fitted electric operated tilt and slide sunroof with blind slider, Electric operated retractable tow bar, Rear park distance control with graphic park assist rear view camera, Electric operated tailgate, Retractable side mirrors, Light and rain sensors, LED Tail lights, Multifunction steering, Airbags, ABS Brakes, Power steering, ISO Fix, Auto stop/start, Tip and paddle shift gearbox, 4 High and low range with diff locks, Factory fitted steering operated touch screen radio with CD charger and BOSE surround sound system, Cruise control, Height up and down select, Sport driving mode, Steering operated touch screen Bluetooth, 4 Zone front and rear climate control, Normal,comfort and sport suspension driver select mode, Cup holders, Electric windows,mirrors and seats, Steering operated touch screen SAT/NAV, Auxiliary input, Jukebox, Electric compass display, Steering operated on board computer, Sport Chrono package, Speed limit warning system, High beam assist, USB Connectivity, Auxiliary power points, Full floor Cayenne protective carpeting, Key operated central locking with alarm/immobilizer.

CONTACT DETAILS:
Phone Cape SUV : 021 982 0334
Niel : 081 408 9188
Martin : 072 246 1367
Visit our website on www.capesuv.co.za

Please confirm dealerships banking details before making a payment to avoid extensive email fraud.
2 Year optional warranty available.
Trade ins welcome.
